specialAbilities.name: Ethereal Jaunt
specialAbilities.description: As a bonus action, the spider can magically shift from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.

specialAbilities.name: Spider Climb
specialAbilities.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

specialAbilities.name: Web Walker
specialAbilities.description: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.
